com.joliciel.talismane.parser

Class ParseComparator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.joliciel.talismane.parser.ParseComparator

  • public class ParseComparator
extends java.lang.Object
    Compare two annotated corpora, one serving as reference and the other as an evaluation. Note: it is assumed that the corpora have an exact matching set of parse configurations!
    Author:
    Assaf Urieli
